choose.when: AND exists ( select code_nm from tb_code where code_nm like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') and code_se = 'CONTACT_NATION_CODE' and code = tc.nation_code )
choose.otherwise: AND ( tc.contact_sj like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR exists ( select code_nm from tb_code where code_nm like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') and code_se = 'CONTACT_NATION_CODE' and code = tc.nation_code ) OR tc.field like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR tc.nmbr_writer_nm like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )

mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_contact tc where 1 = 1

select tc.contact_sn , tc.lang_code , tc.nation_code , ( select code_nm from tb_code where code_se = 'CONTACT_NATION_CODE' and code = tc.nation_code ) nation_code_nm , ( select code_nm_ko from tb_code where code_se = 'CONTACT_NATION_CODE' and code = tc.nation_code ) nation_code_nm_ko , ( select code_nm_en from tb_code where code_se = 'CONTACT_NATION_CODE' and code = tc.nation_code ) nation_code_nm_en , tc.nmbr_writer_nm , tc.contact_sj , tc.contact_cn , tc.company , tc.mbtlnum , tc.email , tc.field , tc.regist_dt , tc.register_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tc.register_sn ) register_nm , tc.updt_dt , tc.updusr_sn from tb_contact tc where 1 = 1
order by tc.regist_dt desc, tc.contact_sn desc
order by tc.regist_dt asc, tc.contact_sn asc
order by tc.contact_sn desc
